alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Washington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 1:55PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Addison and southwestern Washington Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 154 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Middlebury, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Heavy rainfall rates. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Ponding of water will be possible in low lying roads and poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Middlebury, Cornwall, Weybridge, New Haven, Bristol, Lincoln, Salisbury, Waltham, Monkton, Bridport, Ripton, Starksboro, East Middlebury, New Haven Mills, West Lincoln, New Haven Junction, Hollands Pasture Island, South Starksboro and Brooksville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
